title: A Deadly Loop
overview: With the wedding day approaching, bride Liu Jingzhi is found dead at home under suspicious circumstances. Her fianc√©, wealthy businessman Fang Xuewen, is wrongfully accused of her murder and tragically killed in a hail of bullets. However, a sudden, excruciating pain brings him back to consciousness, only to discover that he is trapped in a time loop. Traveling through time and experiencing infinite rebirths, Fang Xuewen vows to uncover the truth behind his wife's tragic death and rewrite the unjust ending to his own life.
